title: Does Wilmington or any organization in Wilmington sponsor a Juneteenth celebration?
text:
Juneteenth celebration: Noon June 19 at Robert Strange Park, 401 S.
Eighth St. Oldest celebration ending slavery. Food vendors, books,
clothes, gifts, crafts, etc. and entertainment. Talent show and parade
has been canceled. Free to public. 371-1610,763-0627.
